title: Beacon Pharma MD Ebadul Karim dies
body: Mohammad Ebadul Karim, managing director of Beacon Pharmaceuticals PLC, and director of Kohinoor Chemicals Company (BD) Limited, passed away on Thursday. He breathed his last at 9:00am while undergoing treatment at a hospital in Dhaka, said a press release. His janaza was scheduled to be held after asr prayer at Gulshan Society Mosque in Dhaka on the same day.
